        public void consentStatusChanged(@NonNull

                                 com.philips.platform.pif.chi.ConsentError consentError,
                                 boolean requestedStatus)
        Description copied from interface: ConsentStatusChangedListener
        Provides callback when value update for ConsentDefinition is requested.
        Specified by:
        consentStatusChanged in interface ConsentStatusChangedListener
        Parameters:
        consentDefinition - ConsentDefinition which needs to be observed.
        consentError - ConsentError if any. Null value means it's a success otherwise an error occured during post.
        requestedStatus - The original request status and not the updated value after store operation.
